pyxalign.io.loaders

File loading module.

This module provides the options and functions for loading the raw data into pyxalign’s standard input format format.

class pyxalign.io.loaders.StandardData(projections: dict[int, ndarray], angles: ndarray, scan_numbers: ndarray, file_paths: dict | None = None, probe_positions: dict[int, ndarray] | None = None, probe: ndarray | None = None, pixel_size: float | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Standard data structure returned by loading functions such as pyxalign.io.loaders.pear.load_data_from_pear_format or pyxalign.io.loaders.xrf.load_data_from_xrf_format
